mapper.update:
update e_equipment_maintain
assembly_id = #{assemblyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintain_type = #{maintainType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintain_time = #{maintainTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
maintain_status = #{maintainStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
repair_content = #{repairContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
replace_parts = #{replaceParts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update e_equipment_maintain set assembly_id = #{assemblyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maintain_type = #{maintainType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maintain_time = #{maintainTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, maintain_status = #{maintainStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, repair_content = #{repairContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, replace_parts = #{replaceParts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.maintain_status maintainStatus, m.maintain_type maintainType, m.assembly_id assemblyId, m.description, m.repair_content repairContent, m.replace_parts replaceParts, m.operator, e.unit_clear unitClear, e.unit_cycle unitCycle, e.unit_name unitName, e.unit_no unitNo, u.chinese_name createName, s.name, s.id sid, s.run_num runNum, m.img_url imgUrl FROM e_equipment_maintain m LEFT JOIN e_equipment e ON m.equipment_id = e.id LEFT JOIN s_users u ON m.create_id = u.id LEFT JOIN e_assembly_set a ON e.id = a.machine_id LEFT JOIN e_assembly_set s ON a.parent_id = s.id AND s.name IS NOT NULL WHERE 1 = 1 AND m.id = #{id} LIMIT 1
